info.title: How to add a new FileTransfer CopyProtocol

chapter.para: FileTransfer protocols can be of two types: external or internal. Examples of external protocols are scp and rcp whereas those of internal protocols are Unicore and Globus.

Usually external FileTransfer happens before the deployment of the process. On the other hand, internal FileTransfer happens at the same time of the process deployment since the specific tools provided by the process are used. This implies that internal FileTransfer protocols cannot be used with other process (e.g. unicore file transfer can not be used when deploying with ssh), but the opposite is valid (e.g. scp can be used when deploying with unicore).

section.para: To add a new external FileTransfer CopyProtocol, follow the steps hereafter:

listitem.para: Add the name of the protocol:. This is done by adding its name in the ALLOWED_COPY_PROTOCOLS[] array of the FileTransferWorkshop class.

para.emphasis: Add the instantiation of the protocol class in the copyProtocolFactory(String name) method of FileTransferWorkshop

warning.para: Choosing the correct name for the protocol is simple, but must be done carefully. All names already in the array ALLOWED_COPY_PROTOCOLS are forbidden. This includes the name 'processDefault', which is also forbidden. Some times, 'processDefault' will correspond to an external FileTransfer protocol (e.g. ssh with scp), and some other times, it will correspond to an internal protocol (e.g. unicore with unicore)

section.para: To add a new internal FileTransfer CopyProtocol, follow the steps hereafter:

listitem.para: Implement the method protected boolean internalFileTransferDefaultProtocol() inside the process class. Note that this method will be called if the processDefault keyword is specified in the XML Descriptor Process Section. Therefore, this method usually must return true, so no other FileTransfer protocols will be tried.
Add the name of the protocol:. This is done by adding its name in the ALLOWED_COPY_PROTOCOLS[] array of the FileTransferWorkshop class.

note.para: When adding an internal FileTransfer protocol, nothing must be modified or added to the copyProtocolFactory(){} method.
